name: uploader-deprecated
description: Provides file-upload functionality that goes beyond the native browser-based methods (multiple file upload, progress tracking, etc.)
author: allenrabinovich

examples.name: uploader-simple
examples.description: How to upload a single file, while tracking progress and using a sprite-skinned button

examples.name: uploader-withvars
examples.displayName: Single File Upload with Additional Data
examples.description: How to upload a single file, along with GET and POST Vars Submission and receive data from the server

examples.name: uploader-multiple
examples.displayName: Multiple Files Upload with Transparent Overlay Button
examples.description: How to upload multiple files with progress tracking and a transparent overlay upload button
